ygData.subject: Set robotsPolicyName to ignore in Heritrix 3.1.0
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I archived some seed urls in Heritrix-3.1.0 and tried to generate the pages using wayback. But the pages did not re generate properly and some css and
